testcase.name: Invalidar sesion
testcase.system-out: * def endPoint = 'https://nodejs-qa-training.herokuapp.com/' .............. passed * def resource = 'users/sessions/invalidate_all' .......................... passed * def getResponseLoguin = call read('Login.feature@FlujoExitoso') ......... passed * def jsonParametroInvalidarSesion = ...................................... passed Given url (endPoint) ...................................................... passed And path (resource) ....................................................... passed And request jsonParametroInvalidarSesion .................................. passed And header Authorization = (getResponseLoguin).responseHeaders['Authorization'][0] . passed When method Post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed
